entry.def: A man, especially a famous man, can be described as a son of the place he comes from.
entry.tran: (某地)之子(籍贯为某地的人，尤指名人)

example.ex: ...New Orleans's most famous son, Louis Armstrong.
example.tran: 新奥尔良最著名的人物——路易斯·阿姆斯特朗

entry.def: Some people use son as a form of address when they are showing kindness or affection to a boy or a man who is younger than them.
entry.tran: 年轻人，孩子(对男孩或比自己年轻的男子的昵称)

example.ex: Don't be frightened by failure, son.

sentences.cn: 圣父、圣子和圣灵
sentences.en: the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit

sentences.cn: 圣父 、 圣子和圣灵不是说成爸爸, 儿子和鬼魂.
sentences.en: The father, Son, and Holy Ghost are not referred to as Daddy, Junior and the spook.

sentences.cn: 圣父无限 、 圣子无限, 圣灵也无限.
sentences.en: The Father incomprehensible, the Son incomprehensible, and the Holy Spirit incomprehensible.

sentences.cn: 那么, 什么是福音? 救恩,乃是圣父, 圣子,和圣灵成就的.
sentences.en: What, then, is the gospel? Salvation is something God the Father, Son and Holy Spirit accomplished.

sentences.cn: 圣经中提到一个三维的圣父 、 圣子和圣灵的三位一体的上帝.
sentences.en: The Bible refers to a three dimensional God as Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.

sentences.cn: 在重庆不要去吃海鲜,贵又不新鲜, 圣子里面有沙是常有的事.
sentences.en: Do not eat seafood in Chongqing, without your fresh, the Son there is often sand.

sentences.cn: 圣子与圣父同体.
sentences.en: The Son is consubstantial with the Father.

sentences.cn: 根据基督教教义,上帝是圣父 、 圣子和圣灵三位一体.
sentences.en: God is Father, Son and Spirit according to the Christian creeds.

sentences.cn: 独一的神, 是三位一体永存的神: 圣父, 圣子,圣灵.
sentences.en: One God, eternally existent in three persons: Father, Son and Holy Spirit.

sentences.cn: 其中有三个人我最为敬佩,圣父, 圣子和圣灵.
sentences.en: And the three men I admire most: The Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.

sentences.cn: 正如圣父 、 圣子 、 圣灵是合一的.
sentences.en: Just as the Father, the Son, the Holy Spirit are one.

sentences.cn: 例如圣父有生命, 圣子有生命, 圣灵也有生命.
sentences.en: For example the father has life, the son has life, the holy spirit has life.

sentences.cn: 在基督教中,圣父 、 圣子、圣灵被称为“三位一体”(圣父 、 圣子及圣灵合为上帝).
sentences.en: The Father, Son, and Holy Spirit are referred to as Trinity in the Christian religion.

sentences.cn: 我们相信上帝为独一真神, 圣父 、 圣子、圣灵三位一体自有永存.
sentences.en: We believe in one true God, eternally existing in three persons : Father, Son and Holy Spirit.

sentences.cn: 我以圣父 、 圣子 、 圣灵的名义为你洗礼.
sentences.en: I baptize thee in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost.

sentences.cn: 愿全能的主保佑您, 以圣父, 圣子和圣灵的名义.
sentences.en: May Almighty God bless you, the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit.

sentences.cn: 永远的法则与天主共存.那么,这就是圣父与圣子同体的那个神圣的实体 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is that then the divine substance wherein Father and Son are consubstantial?

sentences.cn: 上主只有一位圣子,他就是复活与生命.
sentences.en: God has one Son and he is the resurrection and the life.

sentences.cn: 天主是忠信的,因为你们原是由所召,为同的圣子, 我们的主耶稣基督,合而为一.
sentences.en: God is true , through whom you have been part with his Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.

sentences.cn: 圣子, 即耶稣基督, 没有真的上帝和真的人的限制.
sentences.en: The son , Jesus Christ, is without qualification both true God and true man.

sentences.cn: 救恩,乃是圣父, 圣子,和圣灵成就的.
sentences.en: Salvation is something God the Father, Son and Holy Spirit accomplished.

sentences.cn: 以圣父、圣子和圣灵的名义，阿门。
sentences.en: In the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Ghost, Amen.
